channel.title: Dimmu
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left]Welcome to Dimmu!
This is a "Project" I guess you could say. It isn't going to be an extraordinary server, I plan on having it be AT LEAST decent. I don't have much else to say, but I'm sticking with this for good.
Here's my progress: 1. Changed name to Dimmu from WhiteScape 2. Full Specials (all weapons double hit that should) 3. Dark Bow (Seercull)-costs 375M from players 4. Best store bought item is an Adamantite Square 5. Most good items are dropped 6. Welcome Screen-Credits to Sam_Server 7. Full Fletching, yes it features Fletch 'X', I've had it for a while 8. Full Woodcutting-Only missing the Stump ID for Magic and oak 9. 95% Mining, don't have random Gems, or the correct facing position 10. 90% Smithing-Missing Interfaces and random failing on Iron 11. 96% Cooking-Some random burning, based on your lvl 12. 97% Fishing-Don't have a loop so it keeps fishing until you have a full inventory 13. 92% Herblore-Don't have a loop so it keeps filling vials on a fountain/sink 14. Spam Timer-Thanks Mr. Brightside-I believe he made it, each message has to be between 3 seconds 15. If you click on any training object, you get [b][u]-500K[/b] EXPERIENCE 16. All training is on NPC's 17. Based in Lumbridge 18. Portals that have OPTIONS 19. 1V1 PKing in Edgeville 20. CLAN/TEAM PKing at the Mage Bank 21. Working on a good Report system so far =\ 22. Nearly got Muting done with 23. Hack-proof 24. FULL Magic on NPC's 25. FULL Magic on Players 26. Almost working God Spells 27. Removed all quests 28. 100% WORKING TEAM CAPES! Can't attack another player if you're wearing the same Team/CWars cape 29. Can't wield 2H's/Bows with a Shield 30. Range is no longer dependant on your DEFENCE BONUS, it doesn't hit higher if you have it higher 31. Perfect item.cfg 32. Perfect Item.java >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>><<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< That's it for now, that's about 2 days so far
Things to come: Skiller Island Melee Island-Self Explainable Ranging Island-Only NPC's that do Range Attacks Magical Island-Only NPC's that do Magical Attacks More drops Bug Fixes Runecrafting Crafting Agility Thieving Slayer
If you'd like to apply for In-Game/Forum positions, please use this form. I also need a CLIENT CODER!
[code] [b]Position Applying For:[/b] [b]Experience in it:[/b] [b]Do you have proof:[/b]IF YES SHOW PICTURES! BETTER CHANCE! [b]Will you still want to be the staff position if you're not allowed to sell players items:[/b] [b]Will you FOLLOW ALL OF THESE to the fullest:[/b] [/code]
Apply for Client Coder: [code] [b]Experience:[/b]SHOW PICTURES OR DENIED [b]Vouches:[/b]Does anyone know you're good? If so, get them to post a vouch [b]Will you stay loyal:[/b] [/code]
Current Positions: Owner: Fr33b1e
Co-Owner: Nobody yet
Server Coder(s): Only Fr33b1e
Client Coder(s): Not filled
In-Game Mods: No one yet
In-Game Admins: No one yet
Forum Mod: No one yet
Forum Admin: Fr33b1e
I DO NOT ACCEPT SERVE CODERS! I don't want to be sending my source out!
Thanks for your time, ~Fr33b1e~

item.title: Dimmu
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

I currently don’t need any testers. I’m only about 26% done or so on my server. I have a lot more bugs to look at, duping methods to fix, and trading glitches to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Dimmu
item.dc:creator: @X-Zile-Pred X-Zile-Pred
item.description:
@X-Zile-Pred wrote:

Haha nice, Can I be your tester? I’ll apply for Admin / Mod on Fourms.

Read full topic

item.title: Dimmu
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

[shadow=red,left]Welcome to Dimmu!

This is a “Project” I guess you could say. It isn’t going to be an extraordinary server, I plan on having it be AT LEAST decent.
I don’t have much else to say, but I’m sticking with this for good.

Here’s my progress:

  1. Changed name to Dimmu from WhiteScape
  2. Full Specials (all weapons double hit that should)
  3. Dark Bow (Seercull)-costs 375M from players
  4. Best store bought item is an Adamantite Square
  5. Most good items are dropped
  6. Welcome Screen-Credits to Sam_Server
  7. Full Fletching, yes it features Fletch ‘X’, I’ve had it for a while
  8. Full Woodcutting-Only missing the Stump ID for Magic and oak
  9. 95% Mining, don’t have random Gems, or the correct facing position
  10. 90% Smithing-Missing Interfaces and random failing on Iron
  11. 96% Cooking-Some random burning, based on your lvl
  12. 97% Fishing-Don’t have a loop so it keeps fishing until you have a full inventory
  13. 92% Herblore-Don’t have a loop so it keeps filling vials on a fountain/sink
  14. Spam Timer-Thanks Mr. Brightside-I believe he made it, each message has to be between 3 seconds
  15. If you click on any training object, you get [u]-500K EXPERIENCE
  16. All training is on NPC’s
  17. Based in Lumbridge
  18. Portals that have OPTIONS
  19. 1V1 PKing in Edgeville
  20. CLAN/TEAM PKing at the Mage Bank
  21. Working on a good Report system so far =\
  22. Nearly got Muting done with
  23. Hack-proof
  24. FULL Magic on NPC’s
  25. FULL Magic on Players
  26. Almost working God Spells
  27. Removed all quests
  28. 100% WORKING TEAM CAPES! Can’t attack another player if you’re wearing the same Team/CWars cape
  29. Can’t wield 2H’s/Bows with a Shield
  30. Range is no longer dependant on your DEFENCE BONUS, it doesn’t hit higher if you have it higher
  31. Perfect item.cfg
  32. Perfect Item.java

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
That’s it for now, that’s about 2 days so far

Things to come:
Skiller Island
Melee Island-Self Explainable
Ranging Island-Only NPC’s that do Range Attacks
Magical Island-Only NPC’s that do Magical Attacks
More drops
Bug Fixes
Runecrafting
Crafting
Agility
Thieving
Slayer

If you’d like to apply for In-Game/Forum positions, please use this form. I also need a CLIENT CODER!
